    1470                 :      * @return bool                                                                                                                                                                                                            
    1471                 :      */                                                                                                                                                                                                                        
    1472                 :     protected function show_categories() {                                                                                                                                                                                     
    1473               0 :         global $CFG, $DB;                                                                                                                                                                                                      
    1474               0 :         if ($this->showcategories === null) {                                                                                                                                                                                  
    1475               0 :             $show = $this->page->context->contextlevel == CONTEXT_COURSECAT;                                                                                                                                                   
    1476               0 :             $show = $show || (!empty($CFG->navshowcategories) && $DB->count_records('course_categories') > 1);                                                                                                                 
    1477               0 :             $this->showcategories = $show;                                                                                                                                                                                     
    1478               0 :         }                                                                                                                                                                                                                      
    1479               0 :         return $this->showcategories;                                                                                                                                                                                          
    1480                 :     }                                                                                                                                                                                                                          
    1481                 :                                                                                                                                                                                                                                
    1482                 :     /**                                                                                                                                                                                                                        
    1483                 :      * Checks the course format to see whether it wants the navigation to load                                                                                                                                                 
    1484                 :      * additional information for the course.                                                                                                                                                                                  
    1485                 :      *                                                                                                                                                                                                                         
    1486                 :      * This function utilises a callback that can exist within the course format lib.php file                                                                                                                                  
    1487                 :      * The callback should be a function called:                                                                                                                                                                               
    1488                 :      * callback_{formatname}_display_content()                                                                                                                                                                                 
    1489                 :      * It doesn't get any arguments and should return true if additional content is                                                                                                                                            
    1490                 :      * desired. If the callback doesn't exist we assume additional content is wanted.                                                                                                                                          
    1491                 :      *                                                                                                                                                                                                                         
    1492                 :      * @param string $format The course format                                                                                                                                                                                 
    1493                 :      * @return bool                                                                                                                                                                                                            
    1494                 :      */                                                                                                                                                                                                                        
    1495                 :     protected function format_display_course_content($format) {                                                                                                                                                                
    1496               0 :         global $CFG;                                                                                                                                                                                                           
    1497               0 :         $formatlib = $CFG->dirroot.'/course/format/'.$format.'/lib.php';                                                                                                                                                       
    1498               0 :         if (file_exists($formatlib)) {                                                                                                                                                                                         
    1499               0 :             require_once($formatlib);                                                                                                                                                                                          
    1500               0 :             $displayfunc = 'callback_'.$format.'_display_content';                                                                                                                                                             
    1501               0 :             if (function_exists($displayfunc) && !$displayfunc()) {                                                                                                                                                            
    1502               0 :                 return $displayfunc();                                                                                                                                                                                         
    1503                 :             }                                                                                                                                                                                                                  
    1504               0 :         }                                                                                                                                                                                                                      
    1505               0 :         return true;                                                                                                                                                                                                           
    1506                 :     }                                                                                                                                                                                                                          
    1507                 :                                                                                                                                                                                                                                
    1508                 :     /**                                                                                                                                                                                                                        
    1509                 :      * Loads the courses in Moodle into the navigation.                                                                                                                                                                        
    1510                 :      *                                                                                                                                                                                                                         
    1511                 :      * @global moodle_database $DB

    1514                 :      * @return array An array of navigation_nodes one for each course

    1516                 :     protected function load_all_courses($categoryids = null) {

    1676                 :                                                                                                                                                                                                                                
    1677                 :     /**                                                                                                                                                                                                                        
    1678                 :      * Returns true if more courses can be added to the provided category.                                                                                                                                                     
    1679                 :      *                                                                                                                                                                                                                         
    1680                 :      * @param int|navigation_node|stdClass $category                                                                                                                                                                           
    1681                 :      * @return bool                                                                                                                                                                                                            
    1682                 :      */                                                                                                                                                                                                                        
    1683                 :     protected function can_add_more_courses_to_category($category) {                                                                                                                                                           
    1684               0 :         global $CFG;                                                                                                                                                                                                           
    1685               0 :         $limit = 20;                                                                                                                                                                                                           
    1686               0 :         if (!empty($CFG->navcourselimit)) {                                                                                                                                                                                    
    1687               0 :             $limit = (int)$CFG->navcourselimit;                                                                                                                                                                                
    1688               0 :         }                                                                                                                                                                                                                      
    1689               0 :         if (is_numeric($category)) {                                                                                                                                                                                           
    1690               0 :             if (!array_key_exists($category, $this->addedcategories)) {                                                                                                                                                        
    1691               0 :                 return true;                                                                                                                                                                                                   
    1692                 :             }                                                                                                                                                                                                                  
    1693               0 :             $coursecount = count($this->addedcategories[$category]->children->type(self::TYPE_COURSE));                                                                                                                        
    1694               0 :         } else if ($category instanceof navigation_node) {                                                                                                                                                                     
    1695               0 :             if ($category->type != self::TYPE_CATEGORY) {                                                                                                                                                                      
    1696               0 :                 return false;                                                                                                                                                                                                  
    1697                 :             }                                                                                                                                                                                                                  
    1698               0 :             $coursecount = count($category->children->type(self::TYPE_COURSE));                                                                                                                                                
    1699               0 :         } else if (is_object($category) && property_exists($category,'id')) {                                                                                                                                                  
    1700               0 :             $coursecount = count($this->addedcategories[$category->id]->children->type(self::TYPE_COURSE));                                                                                                                    
    1701               0 :         }                                                                                                                                                                                                                      
    1702               0 :         return ($coursecount <= $limit);                                                                                                                                                                                       
    1703                 :     }                                                                                                                                                                                                                          
    1704                 :                                                                                                                                                                                                                                
    1705                 :     /**                                                                                                                                                                                                                        
    1706                 :      * Loads all categories (top level or if an id is specified for that category)                                                                                                                                             
    1707                 :      *                                                                                                                                                                                                                         
    1708                 :      * @param int $categoryid The category id to load or null/0 to load all base level categories                                                                                                                              
    1709                 :      * @param bool $showbasecategories If set to true all base level categories will be loaded as well                                                                                                                         
    1710                 :      *        as the requested category and any parent categories.                                                                                                                                                             
    1711                 :      * @return navigation_node|void returns a navigation node if a category has been loaded.                                                                                                                                   
    1712                 :      */                                                                                                                                                                                                                        
    1713                 :     protected function load_all_categories($categoryid = self::LOAD_ROOT_CATEGORIES, $showbasecategories = false) {                                                                                                            
    1714               0 :         global $DB;                                                                                                                                                                                                            
    1715                 :                                                                                                                                                                                                                                
    1716                 :         // Check if this category has already been loaded                                                                                                                                                                      
    1717               0 :         if ($this->allcategoriesloaded || ($categoryid < 1 && $this->is_category_fully_loaded($categoryid))) {                                                                                                                 
    1718               0 :             return true;                                                                                                                                                                                                       
    1719                 :         }                                                                                                                                                                                                                      
    1720                 :                                                                                                                                                                                                                                
    1721               0 :         $catcontextsql = context_helper::get_preload_record_columns_sql('ctx');                                                                                                                                                
    1722                 :         $sqlselect = "SELECT cc.*, $catcontextsql                                                                                                                                                                              
    1723                 :                       FROM {course_categories} cc                                                                                                                                                                              
    1724               0 :                       JOIN {context} ctx ON cc.id = ctx.instanceid";                                                                                                                                                           
    1725               0 :         $sqlwhere = "WHERE ctx.contextlevel = ".CONTEXT_COURSECAT;                                                                                                                                                             
    1726               0 :         $sqlorder = "ORDER BY cc.depth ASC, cc.sortorder ASC, cc.id ASC";                                                                                                                                                      
    1727               0 :         $params = array();                                                                                                                                                                                                     
    1728                 :                                                                                                                                                                                                                                
    1729               0 :         $categoriestoload = array();                                                                                                                                                                                           
    1730               0 :         if ($categoryid == self::LOAD_ALL_CATEGORIES) {                                                                                                                                                                        
    1731                 :             // We are going to load all categories regardless... prepare to fire                                                                                                                                               
    1732                 :             // on the database server!                                                                                                                                                                                         
    1733               0 :         } else if ($categoryid == self::LOAD_ROOT_CATEGORIES) { // can be 0                                                                                                                                                    
    1734                 :             // We are going to load all of the first level categories (categories without parents)                                                                                                                             
    1735               0 :             $sqlwhere .= " AND cc.parent = 0";                                                                                                                                                                                 
    1736               0 :         } else if (array_key_exists($categoryid, $this->addedcategories)) {                                                                                                                                                    
    1737                 :             // The category itself has been loaded already so we just need to ensure its subcategories                                                                                                                         
    1738                 :             // have been loaded                                                                                                                                                                                                
    1739               0 :             list($sql, $params) = $DB->get_in_or_equal(array_keys($this->addedcategories), SQL_PARAMS_NAMED, 'parent', false);                                                                                                 
    1740               0 :             if ($showbasecategories) {                                                                                                                                                                                         
    1741                 :                 // We need to include categories with parent = 0 as well                                                                                                                                                       
    1742               0 :                 $sqlwhere .= " AND (cc.parent = :categoryid OR cc.parent = 0) AND cc.parent {$sql}";                                                                                                                           
    1743               0 :             } else {                                                                                                                                                                                                           
    1744                 :                 // All we need is categories that match the parent                                                                                                                                                             
    1745               0 :                 $sqlwhere .= " AND cc.parent = :categoryid AND cc.parent {$sql}";                                                                                                                                              
    1746                 :             }                                                                                                                                                                                                                  
    1747               0 :             $params['categoryid'] = $categoryid;                                                                                                                                                                               
    1748               0 :         } else {                                                                                                                                                                                                               
    1749                 :             // This category hasn't been loaded yet so we need to fetch it, work out its category path                                                                                                                         
    1750                 :             // and load this category plus all its parents and subcategories                                                                                                                                                   
    1751               0 :             $category = $DB->get_record('course_categories', array('id' => $categoryid), 'path', MUST_EXIST);                                                                                                                  
    1752               0 :             $categoriestoload = explode('/', trim($category->path, '/'));                                                                                                                                                      
    1753               0 :             list($select, $params) = $DB->get_in_or_equal($categoriestoload);                                                                                                                                                  
    1754                 :             // We are going to use select twice so double the params                                                                                                                                                           
    1755               0 :             $params = array_merge($params, $params);                                                                                                                                                                           
    1756               0 :             $basecategorysql = ($showbasecategories)?' OR cc.depth = 1':'';                                                                                                                                                    
    1757               0 :             $sqlwhere .= " AND (cc.id {$select} OR cc.parent {$select}{$basecategorysql})";                                                                                                                                    
    1758                 :         }                                                                                                                                                                                                                      
    1759                 :                                                                                                                                                                                                                                
    1760               0 :         $categoriesrs = $DB->get_recordset_sql("$sqlselect $sqlwhere $sqlorder", $params);                                                                                                                                     
    1761               0 :         $categories = array();                                                                                                                                                                                                 
    1762               0 :         foreach ($categoriesrs as $category) {                                                                                                                                                                                 
    1763                 :             // Preload the context.. we'll need it when adding the category in order                                                                                                                                           
    1764                 :             // to format the category name.                                                                                                                                                                                    
    1765               0 :             context_helper::preload_from_record($category);                                                                                                                                                                    
    1766               0 :             if (array_key_exists($category->id, $this->addedcategories)) {                                                                                                                                                     
    1767                 :                 // Do nothing, its already been added.                                                                                                                                                                         
    1768               0 :             } else if ($category->parent == '0') {                                                                                                                                                                             
    1769                 :                 // This is a root category lets add it immediately                                                                                                                                                             
    1770               0 :                 $this->add_category($category, $this->rootnodes['courses']);                                                                                                                                                   
    1771               0 :             } else if (array_key_exists($category->parent, $this->addedcategories)) {                                                                                                                                          
    1772                 :                 // This categories parent has already been added we can add this immediately                                                                                                                                   
    1773               0 :                 $this->add_category($category, $this->addedcategories[$category->parent]);                                                                                                                                     
    1774               0 :             } else {                                                                                                                                                                                                           
    1775               0 :                 $categories[] = $category;                                                                                                                                                                                     
    1776                 :             }                                                                                                                                                                                                                  
    1777               0 :         }                                                                                                                                                                                                                      
    1778               0 :         $categoriesrs->close();                                                                                                                                                                                                
    1779                 :                                                                                                                                                                                                                                
    1780                 :         // Now we have an array of categories we need to add them to the navigation.                                                                                                                                           
    1781               0 :         while (!empty($categories)) {                                                                                                                                                                                          
    1782               0 :             $category = reset($categories);                                                                                                                                                                                    
    1783               0 :             if (array_key_exists($category->id, $this->addedcategories)) {                                                                                                                                                     
    1784                 :                 // Do nothing                                                                                                                                                                                                  
    1785               0 :             } else if ($category->parent == '0') {                                                                                                                                                                             
    1786               0 :                 $this->add_category($category, $this->rootnodes['courses']);                                                                                                                                                   
    1787               0 :             } else if (array_key_exists($category->parent, $this->addedcategories)) {                                                                                                                                          
    1788               0 :                 $this->add_category($category, $this->addedcategories[$category->parent]);                                                                                                                                     
    1789               0 :             } else {                                                                                                                                                                                                           
    1790                 :                 // This category isn't in the navigation and niether is it's parent (yet).                                                                                                                                     
    1791                 :                 // We need to go through the category path and add all of its components in order.                                                                                                                             
    1792               0 :                 $path = explode('/', trim($category->path, '/'));                                                                                                                                                              
    1793               0 :                 foreach ($path as $catid) {                                                                                                                                                                                    
    1794               0 :                     if (!array_key_exists($catid, $this->addedcategories)) {                                                                                                                                                   
    1795                 :                         // This category isn't in the navigation yet so add it.                                                                                                                                                
    1796               0 :                         $subcategory = $categories[$catid];                                                                                                                                                                    
    1797               0 :                         if ($subcategory->parent == '0') {                                                                                                                                                                     
    1798                 :                             // Yay we have a root category - this likely means we will now be able                                                                                                                             
    1799                 :                             // to add categories without problems.                                                                                                                                                             
    1800               0 :                             $this->add_category($subcategory, $this->rootnodes['courses']);                                                                                                                                    
    1801               0 :                         } else if (array_key_exists($subcategory->parent, $this->addedcategories)) {                                                                                                                           
    1802                 :                             // The parent is in the category (as we'd expect) so add it now.                                                                                                                                   
    1803               0 :                             $this->add_category($subcategory, $this->addedcategories[$subcategory->parent]);                                                                                                                   
    1804                 :                             // Remove the category from the categories array.                                                                                                                                                  
    1805               0 :                             unset($categories[$catid]);                                                                                                                                                                        
    1806               0 :                         } else {                                                                                                                                                                                               
    1807                 :                             // We should never ever arrive here - if we have then there is a bigger                                                                                                                            
    1808                 :                             // problem at hand.

    1810                 :                         }                                                                                                                                                                                                      
    1811               0 :                     }

    1878                 :     /**                                                                                                                                                                                                                        
    1879                 :      * Loads all of the courses section into the navigation.                                                                                                                                                                   
    1880                 :      *                                                                                                                                                                                                                         
    1881                 :      * This function utilisies a callback that can be implemented within the course                                                                                                                                            
    1882                 :      * formats lib.php file to customise the navigation that is generated at this                                                                                                                                              
    1883                 :      * point for the course.                                                                                                                                                                                                   
    1884                 :      *                                                                                                                                                                                                                         
    1885                 :      * By default (if not defined) the method {@link global_navigation::load_generic_course_sections()} is                                                                                                                     
    1886                 :      * called instead.

    1891                 :      */                                                                                                                                                                                                                        
    1892                 :     protected function load_course_sections(stdClass $course, navigation_node $coursenode) {                                                                                                                                   
    1893               0 :         global $CFG;                                                                                                                                                                                                           
    1894               0 :         $structurefile = $CFG->dirroot.'/course/format/'.$course->format.'/lib.php';                                                                                                                                           
    1895               0 :         $structurefunc = 'callback_'.$course->format.'_load_content';                                                                                                                                                          
    1896               0 :         if (function_exists($structurefunc)) {                                                                                                                                                                                 
    1897               0 :             return $structurefunc($this, $course, $coursenode);                                                                                                                                                                
    1898               0 :         } else if (file_exists($structurefile)) {                                                                                                                                                                              
    1899               0 :             require_once $structurefile;                                                                                                                                                                                       
    1900               0 :             if (function_exists($structurefunc)) {                                                                                                                                                                             
    1901               0 :                 return $structurefunc($this, $course, $coursenode);                                                                                                                                                            
    1902                 :             } else {                                                                                                                                                                                                           
    1903               0 :                 return $this->load_generic_course_sections($course, $coursenode);                                                                                                                                              
    1904                 :             }                                                                                                                                                                                                                  
    1905                 :         } else {                                                                                                                                                                                                               
    1906               0 :             return $this->load_generic_course_sections($course, $coursenode);                                                                                                                                                  
    1907                 :         }

    1910                 :     /**                                                                                                                                                                                                                        
    1911                 :      * Generates an array of sections and an array of activities for the given course.

    1918                 :     protected function generate_sections_and_activities(stdClass $course) {                                                                                                                                                    
    1919               0 :         global $CFG;                                                                                                                                                                                                           
    1920               0 :         require_once($CFG->dirroot.'/course/lib.php');                                                                                                                                                                         
    1921                 :                                                                                                                                                                                                                                
    1922               0 :         $modinfo = get_fast_modinfo($course);                                                                                                                                                                                  
    1923               0 :         $sections = array_slice($modinfo->get_section_info_all(), 0, $course->numsections+1, true);                                                                                                                            
    1924               0 :         $activities = array();                                                                                                                                                                                                 
    1925                 :                                                                                                                                                                                                                                
    1926               0 :         foreach ($sections as $key => $section) {                                                                                                                                                                              
    1927               0 :             $sections[$key]->hasactivites = false;                                                                                                                                                                             
    1928               0 :             if (!array_key_exists($section->section, $modinfo->sections)) {                                                                                                                                                    
    1929               0 :                 continue;                                                                                                                                                                                                      
    1930                 :             }                                                                                                                                                                                                                  
    1931               0 :             foreach ($modinfo->sections[$section->section] as $cmid) {                                                                                                                                                         
    1932               0 :                 $cm = $modinfo->cms[$cmid];                                                                                                                                                                                    
    1933               0 :                 if (!$cm->uservisible) {                                                                                                                                                                                       
    1934               0 :                     continue;                                                                                                                                                                                                  
    1935                 :                 }                                                                                                                                                                                                              
    1936               0 :                 $activity = new stdClass;                                                                                                                                                                                      
    1937               0 :                 $activity->id = $cm->id;                                                                                                                                                                                       
    1938               0 :                 $activity->course = $course->id;                                                                                                                                                                               
    1939               0 :                 $activity->section = $section->section;                                                                                                                                                                        
    1940               0 :                 $activity->name = $cm->name;                                                                                                                                                                                   
    1941               0 :                 $activity->icon = $cm->icon;                                                                                                                                                                                   
    1942               0 :                 $activity->iconcomponent = $cm->iconcomponent;                                                                                                                                                                 
    1943               0 :                 $activity->hidden = (!$cm->visible);                                                                                                                                                                           
    1944               0 :                 $activity->modname = $cm->modname;                                                                                                                                                                             
    1945               0 :                 $activity->nodetype = navigation_node::NODETYPE_LEAF;                                                                                                                                                          
    1946               0 :                 $activity->onclick = $cm->get_on_click();                                                                                                                                                                      
    1947               0 :                 $url = $cm->get_url();

    1949               0 :                     $activity->url = null;                                                                                                                                                                                     
    1950               0 :                     $activity->display = false;

    1953               0 :                     $activity->display = true;

    1961               0 :                 }                                                                                                                                                                                                              
    1962               0 :             }

    1964                 :

    2037                 :     /**                                                                                                                                                                                                                        
    2038                 :      * Loads all of the activities for a section into the navigation structure.

    2045                 :      */                                                                                                                                                                                                                        
    2046                 :     protected function load_section_activities(navigation_node $sectionnode, $sectionnumber, array $activities, $course = null) {                                                                                              
    2047               0 :         global $CFG, $SITE;                                                                                                                                                                                                    
    2048                 :         // A static counter for JS function naming                                                                                                                                                                             
    2049               0 :         static $legacyonclickcounter = 0;                                                                                                                                                                                      
    2050                 :                                                                                                                                                                                                                                
    2051               0 :         $activitynodes = array();                                                                                                                                                                                              
    2052               0 :         if (empty($activities)) {                                                                                                                                                                                              
    2053               0 :             return $activitynodes;                                                                                                                                                                                             
    2054                 :         }                                                                                                                                                                                                                      
    2055                 :                                                                                                                                                                                                                                
    2056               0 :         if (!is_object($course)) {                                                                                                                                                                                             
    2057               0 :             $activity = reset($activities);                                                                                                                                                                                    
    2058               0 :             $courseid = $activity->course;                                                                                                                                                                                     
    2059               0 :         } else {                                                                                                                                                                                                               
    2060               0 :             $courseid = $course->id;                                                                                                                                                                                           
    2061                 :         }                                                                                                                                                                                                                      
    2062               0 :         $showactivities = ($courseid != $SITE->id || !empty($CFG->navshowfrontpagemods));                                                                                                                                      
    2063                 :                                                                                                                                                                                                                                
    2064               0 :         foreach ($activities as $activity) {                                                                                                                                                                                   
    2065               0 :             if ($activity->section != $sectionnumber) {                                                                                                                                                                        
    2066               0 :                 continue;                                                                                                                                                                                                      
    2067                 :             }                                                                                                                                                                                                                  
    2068               0 :             if ($activity->icon) {                                                                                                                                                                                             
    2069               0 :                 $icon = new pix_icon($activity->icon, get_string('modulename', $activity->modname), $activity->iconcomponent);                                                                                                 
    2070               0 :             } else {                                                                                                                                                                                                           
    2071               0 :                 $icon = new pix_icon('icon', get_string('modulename', $activity->modname), $activity->modname);                                                                                                                
    2072                 :             }                                                                                                                                                                                                                  
    2073                 :                                                                                                                                                                                                                                
    2074                 :             // Prepare the default name and url for the node                                                                                                                                                                   
    2075               0 :             $activityname = format_string($activity->name, true, array('context' => get_context_instance(CONTEXT_MODULE, $activity->id)));                                                                                     
    2076               0 :             $action = new moodle_url($activity->url);                                                                                                                                                                          
    2077                 :                                                                                                                                                                                                                                
    2078                 :             // Check if the onclick property is set (puke!)                                                                                                                                                                    
    2079               0 :             if (!empty($activity->onclick)) {                                                                                                                                                                                  
    2080                 :                 // Increment the counter so that we have a unique number.                                                                                                                                                      
    2081               0 :                 $legacyonclickcounter++;                                                                                                                                                                                       
    2082                 :                 // Generate the function name we will use                                                                                                                                                                      
    2083               0 :                 $functionname = 'legacy_activity_onclick_handler_'.$legacyonclickcounter;                                                                                                                                      
    2084               0 :                 $propogrationhandler = '';                                                                                                                                                                                     
    2085                 :                 // Check if we need to cancel propogation. Remember inline onclick                                                                                                                                             
    2086                 :                 // events would return false if they wanted to prevent propogation and the                                                                                                                                     
    2087                 :                 // default action.                                                                                                                                                                                             
    2088               0 :                 if (strpos($activity->onclick, 'return false')) {                                                                                                                                                              
    2089               0 :                     $propogrationhandler = 'e.halt();';                                                                                                                                                                        
    2090               0 :                 }                                                                                                                                                                                                              
    2091                 :                 // Decode the onclick - it has already been encoded for display (puke)                                                                                                                                         
    2092               0 :                 $onclick = htmlspecialchars_decode($activity->onclick);                                                                                                                                                        
    2093                 :                 // Build the JS function the click event will call                                                                                                                                                             
    2094               0 :                 $jscode = "function {$functionname}(e) { $propogrationhandler $onclick }";                                                                                                                                     
    2095               0 :                 $this->page->requires->js_init_code($jscode);                                                                                                                                                                  
    2096                 :                 // Override the default url with the new action link                                                                                                                                                           
    2097               0 :                 $action = new action_link($action, $activityname, new component_action('click', $functionname));                                                                                                               
    2098               0 :             }                                                                                                                                                                                                                  
    2099                 :                                                                                                                                                                                                                                
    2100               0 :             $activitynode = $sectionnode->add($activityname, $action, navigation_node::TYPE_ACTIVITY, null, $activity->id, $icon);

    2102               0 :             $activitynode->hidden = $activity->hidden;                                                                                                                                                                         
    2103               0 :             $activitynode->display = $showactivities && $activity->display;                                                                                                                                                    
    2104               0 :             $activitynode->nodetype = $activity->nodetype;                                                                                                                                                                     
    2105               0 :             $activitynodes[$activity->id] = $activitynode;                                                                                                                                                                     
    2106               0 :         }                                                                                                                                                                                                                      
    2107                 :                                                                                                                                                                                                                                
    2108               0 :         return $activitynodes;                                                                                                                                                                                                 
    2109                 :     }                                                                                                                                                                                                                          
    2110                 :     /**                                                                                                                                                                                                                        
    2111                 :      * Loads a stealth module from unavailable section

    2115                 :      */                                                                                                                                                                                                                        
    2116                 :     protected function load_stealth_activity(navigation_node $coursenode, $modinfo) {

    2118               0 :             return null;                                                                                                                                                                                                       
    2119                 :         }                                                                                                                                                                                                                      
    2120               0 :         $cm = $modinfo->cms[$this->page->cm->id];                                                                                                                                                                              
    2121               0 :         if (!$cm->uservisible) {                                                                                                                                                                                               
    2122               0 :             return null;
