    2141                 :     /**

    2149                 :      *  * {@link forum_extend_navigation()}

    2710                 :     /**                                                                                                                                                                                                                        
    2711                 :      * Sets an expansion limit for the navigation                                                                                                                                                                              
    2712                 :      *                                                                                                                                                                                                                         
    2713                 :      * The expansion limit is used to prevent the display of content that has a type                                                                                                                                           
    2714                 :      * greater than the provided $type.                                                                                                                                                                                        
    2715                 :      *                                                                                                                                                                                                                         
    2716                 :      * Can be used to ensure things such as activities or activity content don't get                                                                                                                                           
    2717                 :      * shown on the navigation.                                                                                                                                                                                                
    2718                 :      * They are still generated in order to ensure the navbar still makes sense.                                                                                                                                               
    2719                 :      *                                                                                                                                                                                                                         
    2720                 :      * @param int $type One of navigation_node::TYPE_*                                                                                                                                                                         
    2721                 :      * @return bool true when complete.                                                                                                                                                                                        
    2722                 :      */                                                                                                                                                                                                                        
    2723                 :     public function set_expansion_limit($type) {                                                                                                                                                                               
    2724               0 :         global $SITE;                                                                                                                                                                                                          
    2725               0 :         $nodes = $this->find_all_of_type($type);                                                                                                                                                                               
    2726               0 :         foreach ($nodes as &$node) {                                                                                                                                                                                           
    2727                 :             // We need to generate the full site node                                                                                                                                                                          
    2728               0 :             if ($type == self::TYPE_COURSE && $node->key == $SITE->id) {                                                                                                                                                       
    2729               0 :                 continue;                                                                                                                                                                                                      
    2730                 :             }                                                                                                                                                                                                                  
    2731               0 :             foreach ($node->children as &$child) {                                                                                                                                                                             
    2732                 :                 // We still want to show course reports and participants containers                                                                                                                                            
    2733                 :                 // or there will be navigation missing.                                                                                                                                                                        
    2734               0 :                 if ($type == self::TYPE_COURSE && $child->type === self::TYPE_CONTAINER) {                                                                                                                                     
    2735               0 :                     continue;                                                                                                                                                                                                  
    2736                 :                 }                                                                                                                                                                                                              
    2737               0 :                 $child->display = false;                                                                                                                                                                                       
    2738               0 :             }                                                                                                                                                                                                                  
    2739               0 :         }                                                                                                                                                                                                                      
    2740               0 :         return true;                                                                                                                                                                                                           
    2741                 :     }                                                                                                                                                                                                                          
    2742                 :     /**                                                                                                                                                                                                                        
    2743                 :      * Attempts to get the navigation with the given key from this nodes children.                                                                                                                                             
    2744                 :      *                                                                                                                                                                                                                         
    2745                 :      * This function only looks at this nodes children, it does NOT look recursivily.                                                                                                                                          
    2746                 :      * If the node can't be found then false is returned.                                                                                                                                                                      
    2747                 :      *                                                                                                                                                                                                                         
    2748                 :      * If you need to search recursivily then use the {@link global_navigation::find()} method.                                                                                                                                
    2749                 :      *                                                                                                                                                                                                                         
    2750                 :      * Note: If you are trying to set the active node {@link navigation_node::override_active_url()}                                                                                                                           
    2751                 :      * may be of more use to you.                                                                                                                                                                                              
    2752                 :      *                                                                                                                                                                                                                         
    2753                 :      * @param string|int $key The key of the node you wish to receive.                                                                                                                                                         
    2754                 :      * @param int $type One of navigation_node::TYPE_*                                                                                                                                                                         
    2755                 :      * @return navigation_node|false                                                                                                                                                                                           
    2756                 :      */                                                                                                                                                                                                                        
    2757                 :     public function get($key, $type = null) {                                                                                                                                                                                  
    2758               0 :         if (!$this->initialised) {                                                                                                                                                                                             
    2759               0 :             $this->initialise();                                                                                                                                                                                               
    2760               0 :         }                                                                                                                                                                                                                      
    2761               0 :         return parent::get($key, $type);                                                                                                                                                                                       
    2762                 :     }                                                                                                                                                                                                                          
    2763                 :                                                                                                                                                                                                                                
    2764                 :     /**                                                                                                                                                                                                                        
    2765                 :      * Searches this nodes children and their children to find a navigation node                                                                                                                                               
    2766                 :      * with the matching key and type.                                                                                                                                                                                         
    2767                 :      *                                                                                                                                                                                                                         
    2768                 :      * This method is recursive and searches children so until either a node is                                                                                                                                                
    2769                 :      * found or there are no more nodes to search.                                                                                                                                                                             
    2770                 :      *                                                                                                                                                                                                                         
    2771                 :      * If you know that the node being searched for is a child of this node                                                                                                                                                    
    2772                 :      * then use the {@link global_navigation::get()} method instead.                                                                                                                                                           
    2773                 :      *                                                                                                                                                                                                                         
    2774                 :      * Note: If you are trying to set the active node {@link navigation_node::override_active_url()}                                                                                                                           
    2775                 :      * may be of more use to you.                                                                                                                                                                                              
    2776                 :      *                                                                                                                                                                                                                         
    2777                 :      * @param string|int $key The key of the node you wish to receive.                                                                                                                                                         
    2778                 :      * @param int $type One of navigation_node::TYPE_*                                                                                                                                                                         
    2779                 :      * @return navigation_node|false                                                                                                                                                                                           
    2780                 :      */                                                                                                                                                                                                                        
    2781                 :     public function find($key, $type) {                                                                                                                                                                                        
    2782               0 :         if (!$this->initialised) {                                                                                                                                                                                             
    2783               0 :             $this->initialise();                                                                                                                                                                                               
    2784               0 :         }                                                                                                                                                                                                                      
    2785               0 :         return parent::find($key, $type);                                                                                                                                                                                      
    2786                 :     }                                                                                                                                                                                                                          
    2787                 : }                                                                                                                                                                                                                              
    2788                 :                                                                                                                                                                                                                                
    2789                 : /**                                                                                                                                                                                                                            
    2790                 :  * The global navigation class used especially for AJAX requests.                                                                                                                                                              
    2791                 :  *                                                                                                                                                                                                                             
    2792                 :  * The primary methods that are used in the global navigation class have been overriden                                                                                                                                        
    2793                 :  * to ensure that only the relevant branch is generated at the root of the tree.                                                                                                                                               
    2794                 :  * This can be done because AJAX is only used when the backwards structure for the                                                                                                                                             
    2795                 :  * requested branch exists.                                                                                                                                                                                                    
    2796                 :  * This has been done only because it shortens the amounts of information that is generated                                                                                                                                    
    2797                 :  * which of course will speed up the response time.. because no one likes laggy AJAX.                                                                                                                                          
    2798                 :  *                                                                                                                                                                                                                             
    2799                 :  * @package   core                                                                                                                                                                                                             
    2800                 :  * @category  navigation                                                                                                                                                                                                       
    2801                 :  * @copyright 2009 Sam Hemelryk                                                                                                                                                                                                
    2802                 :  * @license   http://www.gnu.org/copyleft/gpl.html GNU GPL v3 or later                                                                                                                                                         
    2803                 :  */                                                                                                                                                                                                                            
    2804                 : class global_navigation_for_ajax extends global_navigation {                                                                                                                                                                   
    2805                 :                                                                                                                                                                                                                                
    2806                 :     /** @var int used for determining what type of navigation_node::TYPE_* is being used */                                                                                                                                    
    2807                 :     protected $branchtype;                                                                                                                                                                                                     
    2808                 :                                                                                                                                                                                                                                
    2809                 :     /** @var int the instance id */

    2822                 :     public function __construct($page, $branchtype, $id) {

    2835                 :     public function initialise() {                                                                                                                                                                                             
    2836               0 :         global $CFG, $DB, $SITE;                                                                                                                                                                                               
    2837                 :

    2839               0 :             return $this->expandable;

    2845               0 :         $this->rootnodes['courses'] = $this->add(get_string('courses'), null, self::TYPE_ROOTNODE, null, 'courses');                                                                                                           
    2846                 :                                                                                                                                                                                                                                
    2847                 :         // Branchtype will be one of navigation_node::TYPE_*                                                                                                                                                                   
    2848               0 :         switch ($this->branchtype) {                                                                                                                                                                                           
    2849               0 :             case self::TYPE_CATEGORY :                                                                                                                                                                                         
    2850               0 :                 $this->load_category($this->instanceid);                                                                                                                                                                       
    2851               0 :                 break;                                                                                                                                                                                                         
    2852               0 :             case self::TYPE_COURSE :                                                                                                                                                                                           
    2853               0 :                 $course = $DB->get_record('course', array('id' => $this->instanceid), '*', MUST_EXIST);                                                                                                                        
    2854               0 :                 require_course_login($course, true, null, false, true);

    2860               0 :                 }

    2864                 :                         FROM {course} c

    2866               0 :                         WHERE cs.id = ?';

    2910                 :     /**                                                                                                                                                                                                                        
    2911                 :      * Loads a single category into the AJAX navigation.                                                                                                                                                                       
    2912                 :      *                                                                                                                                                                                                                         
    2913                 :      * This function is special in that it doesn't concern itself with the parent of                                                                                                                                           
    2914                 :      * the requested category or its siblings.                                                                                                                                                                                 
    2915                 :      * This is because with the AJAX navigation we know exactly what is wanted and only need to                                                                                                                                
    2916                 :      * request that.                                                                                                                                                                                                           
    2917                 :      *                                                                                                                                                                                                                         
    2918                 :      * @global moodle_database $DB                                                                                                                                                                                             
    2919                 :      * @param int $categoryid                                                                                                                                                                                                  
    2920                 :      */                                                                                                                                                                                                                        
    2921                 :     protected function load_category($categoryid) {                                                                                                                                                                            
    2922               0 :         global $CFG, $DB;                                                                                                                                                                                                      
    2923                 :                                                                                                                                                                                                                                
    2924               0 :         $limit = 20;                                                                                                                                                                                                           
    2925               0 :         if (!empty($CFG->navcourselimit)) {                                                                                                                                                                                    
    2926               0 :             $limit = (int)$CFG->navcourselimit;                                                                                                                                                                                
    2927               0 :         }                                                                                                                                                                                                                      
    2928                 :                                                                                                                                                                                                                                
    2929               0 :         $catcontextsql = context_helper::get_preload_record_columns_sql('ctx');                                                                                                                                                
    2930                 :         $sql = "SELECT cc.*, $catcontextsql                                                                                                                                                                                    
    2931                 :                   FROM {course_categories} cc                                                                                                                                                                                  
    2932                 :                   JOIN {context} ctx ON cc.id = ctx.instanceid                                                                                                                                                                 
    2933               0 :                  WHERE ctx.contextlevel = ".CONTEXT_COURSECAT." AND                                                                                                                                                            
    2934                 :                        (cc.id = :categoryid1 OR cc.parent = :categoryid2)                                                                                                                                                      
    2935               0 :               ORDER BY cc.depth ASC, cc.sortorder ASC, cc.id ASC";                                                                                                                                                             
    2936               0 :         $params = array('categoryid1' => $categoryid, 'categoryid2' => $categoryid);                                                                                                                                           
    2937               0 :         $categories = $DB->get_recordset_sql($sql, $params, 0, $limit);                                                                                                                                                        
    2938               0 :         $subcategories = array();                                                                                                                                                                                              
    2939               0 :         $basecategory = null;                                                                                                                                                                                                  
    2940               0 :         foreach ($categories as $category) {                                                                                                                                                                                   
    2941               0 :             context_helper::preload_from_record($category);                                                                                                                                                                    
    2942               0 :             if ($category->id == $categoryid) {                                                                                                                                                                                
    2943               0 :                 $this->add_category($category, $this);                                                                                                                                                                         
    2944               0 :                 $basecategory = $this->addedcategories[$category->id];                                                                                                                                                         
    2945               0 :             } else {                                                                                                                                                                                                           
    2946               0 :                 $subcategories[] = $category;                                                                                                                                                                                  
    2947                 :             }                                                                                                                                                                                                                  
    2948               0 :         }                                                                                                                                                                                                                      
    2949               0 :         $categories->close();                                                                                                                                                                                                  
    2950                 :                                                                                                                                                                                                                                
    2951               0 :         if (!is_null($basecategory)) {                                                                                                                                                                                         
    2952                 :             //echo "<pre>".print_r($subcategories, true).'</pre>';                                                                                                                                                             
    2953               0 :             foreach ($subcategories as $category) {                                                                                                                                                                            
    2954               0 :                 $this->add_category($category, $basecategory);                                                                                                                                                                 
    2955               0 :             }                                                                                                                                                                                                                  
    2956               0 :         }                                                                                                                                                                                                                      
    2957                 :                                                                                                                                                                                                                                
    2958               0 :         $courses = $DB->get_recordset('course', array('category' => $categoryid), 'sortorder', '*' , 0, $limit);                                                                                                               
    2959               0 :         foreach ($courses as $course) {                                                                                                                                                                                        
    2960               0 :             $this->add_course($course);                                                                                                                                                                                        
    2961               0 :         }                                                                                                                                                                                                                      
    2962               0 :         $courses->close();                                                                                                                                                                                                     
    2963               0 :     }                                                                                                                                                                                                                          
    2964                 :

    2969                 :     public function get_expandable() {

    2974                 : /**                                                                                                                                                                                                                            
    2975                 :  * Navbar class                                                                                                                                                                                                                
    2976                 :  *                                                                                                                                                                                                                             
    2977                 :  * This class is used to manage the navbar, which is initialised from the navigation

    2985                 : class navbar extends navigation_node {                                                                                                                                                                                         
    2986                 :     /** @var bool A switch for whether the navbar is initialised or not */                                                                                                                                                     
    2987                 :     protected $initialised = false;                                                                                                                                                                                            
    2988                 :     /** @var mixed keys used to reference the nodes on the navbar */

    3002                 :     /** @var array An array of child node objects */                                                                                                                                                                           
    3003                 :     public $children = array();

    3005                 :     public $includesettingsbase = false;                                                                                                                                                                                       
    3006                 :     /**                                                                                                                                                                                                                        
    3007                 :      * The almighty constructor

    3009                 :      * @param moodle_page $page                                                                                                                                                                                                
    3010                 :      */                                                                                                                                                                                                                        
    3011                 :     public function __construct(moodle_page $page) {                                                                                                                                                                           
    3012               0 :         global $CFG;                                                                                                                                                                                                           
    3013               0 :         if (during_initial_install()) {                                                                                                                                                                                        
    3014               0 :             $this->duringinstall = true;                                                                                                                                                                                       
    3015               0 :             return false;                                                                                                                                                                                                      
    3016                 :         }                                                                                                                                                                                                                      
    3017               0 :         $this->page = $page;                                                                                                                                                                                                   
    3018               0 :         $this->text = get_string('home');                                                                                                                                                                                      
    3019               0 :         $this->shorttext = get_string('home');                                                                                                                                                                                 
    3020               0 :         $this->action = new moodle_url($CFG->wwwroot);                                                                                                                                                                         
    3021               0 :         $this->nodetype = self::NODETYPE_BRANCH;                                                                                                                                                                               
    3022               0 :         $this->type = self::TYPE_SYSTEM;                                                                                                                                                                                       
    3023               0 :     }                                                                                                                                                                                                                          
    3024                 :                                                                                                                                                                                                                                
    3025                 :     /**                                                                                                                                                                                                                        
    3026                 :      * Quick check to see if the navbar will have items in.                                                                                                                                                                    
    3027                 :      *

    3322                 :     /**                                                                                                                                                                                                                        
    3323                 :      * Override the parent function so that we can add preceeding hr's and set a                                                                                                                                               
    3324                 :      * root node class against all first level element                                                                                                                                                                         
    3325                 :      *                                                                                                                                                                                                                         
    3326                 :      * It does this by first calling the parent's add method {@link navigation_node::add()}                                                                                                                                    
    3327                 :      * and then proceeds to use the key to set class and hr                                                                                                                                                                    
    3328                 :      *                                                                                                                                                                                                                         
    3329                 :      * @param string $text text to be used for the link.                                                                                                                                                                       
    3330                 :      * @param string|moodle_url $url url for the new node                                                                                                                                                                      
    3331                 :      * @param int $type the type of node navigation_node::TYPE_*                                                                                                                                                               
    3332                 :      * @param string $shorttext                                                                                                                                                                                                
    3333                 :      * @param string|int $key a key to access the node by.                                                                                                                                                                     
    3334                 :      * @param pix_icon $icon An icon that appears next to the node.                                                                                                                                                            
    3335                 :      * @return navigation_node with the new node added to it.                                                                                                                                                                  
    3336                 :      */                                                                                                                                                                                                                        
    3337                 :     public function add($text, $url=null, $type=null, $shorttext=null, $key=null, pix_icon $icon=null) {                                                                                                                       
    3338               0 :         $node = parent::add($text, $url, $type, $shorttext, $key, $icon);                                                                                                                                                      
    3339               0 :         $node->add_class('root_node');                                                                                                                                                                                         
    3340               0 :         return $node;                                                                                                                                                                                                          
    3341                 :     }                                                                                                                                                                                                                          
    3342                 :                                                                                                                                                                                                                                
    3343                 :     /**                                                                                                                                                                                                                        
    3344                 :      * This function allows the user to add something to the start of the settings                                                                                                                                             
    3345                 :      * navigation, which means it will be at the top of the settings navigation block                                                                                                                                          
    3346                 :      *                                                                                                                                                                                                                         
    3347                 :      * @param string $text text to be used for the link.                                                                                                                                                                       
    3348                 :      * @param string|moodle_url $url url for the new node                                                                                                                                                                      
    3349                 :      * @param int $type the type of node navigation_node::TYPE_*                                                                                                                                                               
    3350                 :      * @param string $shorttext                                                                                                                                                                                                
    3351                 :      * @param string|int $key a key to access the node by.                                                                                                                                                                     
    3352                 :      * @param pix_icon $icon An icon that appears next to the node.

    3909                 :                                                                                                                                                                                                                                
    3910                 :     /**                                                                                                                                                                                                                        
    3911                 :      * Loads the user settings block of the settings nav                                                                                                                                                                       
    3912                 :      *                                                                                                                                                                                                                         
    3913                 :      * This function is simply works out the userid and whether we need to load                                                                                                                                                
    3914                 :      * just the current users profile settings, or the current user and the user the                                                                                                                                           
    3915                 :      * current user is viewing.                                                                                                                                                                                                
    3916                 :      *                                                                                                                                                                                                                         
    3917                 :      * This function has some very ugly code to work out the user, if anyone has                                                                                                                                               
    3918                 :      * any bright ideas please feel free to intervene.                                                                                                                                                                         
    3919                 :      *                                                                                                                                                                                                                         
    3920                 :      * @param int $courseid The course id of the current course                                                                                                                                                                
    3921                 :      * @return navigation_node|false                                                                                                                                                                                           
    3922                 :      */                                                                                                                                                                                                                        
    3923                 :     protected function load_user_settings($courseid = SITEID) {                                                                                                                                                                
    3924               0 :         global $USER, $CFG;                                                                                                                                                                                                    
    3925                 :                                                                                                                                                                                                                                
    3926               0 :         if (isguestuser() || !isloggedin()) {                                                                                                                                                                                  
    3927               0 :             return false;                                                                                                                                                                                                      
    3928                 :         }                                                                                                                                                                                                                      
    3929                 :                                                                                                                                                                                                                                
    3930               0 :         $navusers = $this->page->navigation->get_extending_users();                                                                                                                                                            
    3931                 :                                                                                                                                                                                                                                
    3932               0 :         if (count($this->userstoextendfor) > 0 || count($navusers) > 0) {                                                                                                                                                      
    3933               0 :             $usernode = null;                                                                                                                                                                                                  
    3934               0 :             foreach ($this->userstoextendfor as $userid) {                                                                                                                                                                     
    3935               0 :                 if ($userid == $USER->id) {

    4304                 :     /**                                                                                                                                                                                                                        
    4305                 :      * Determine whether the user is assuming another role                                                                                                                                                                     
    4306                 :      *                                                                                                                                                                                                                         
    4307                 :      * This function checks to see if the user is assuming another role by means of                                                                                                                                            
    4308                 :      * role switching. In doing this we compare each RSW key (context path) against                                                                                                                                            
    4309                 :      * the current context path. This ensures that we can provide the switching                                                                                                                                                
    4310                 :      * options against both the course and any page shown under the course.                                                                                                                                                    
    4311                 :      *                                                                                                                                                                                                                         
    4312                 :      * @return bool|int The role(int) if the user is in another role, false otherwise                                                                                                                                          
    4313                 :      */                                                                                                                                                                                                                        
    4314                 :     protected function in_alternative_role() {                                                                                                                                                                                 
    4315               0 :         global $USER;                                                                                                                                                                                                          
    4316               0 :         if (!empty($USER->access['rsw']) && is_array($USER->access['rsw'])) {                                                                                                                                                  
    4317               0 :             if (!empty($this->page->context) && !empty($USER->access['rsw'][$this->page->context->path])) {                                                                                                                    
    4318               0 :                 return $USER->access['rsw'][$this->page->context->path];                                                                                                                                                       
    4319                 :             }                                                                                                                                                                                                                  
    4320               0 :             foreach ($USER->access['rsw'] as $key=>$role) {                                                                                                                                                                    
    4321               0 :                 if (strpos($this->context->path,$key)===0) {                                                                                                                                                                   
    4322               0 :                     return $role;                                                                                                                                                                                              
    4323                 :                 }                                                                                                                                                                                                              
    4324               0 :             }                                                                                                                                                                                                                  
    4325               0 :         }                                                                                                                                                                                                                      
    4326               0 :         return false;                                                                                                                                                                                                          
    4327                 :     }

    4417                 :                                                                                                                                                                                                                                
    4418                 : /**                                                                                                                                                                                                                            
    4419                 :  * Simple class used to output a navigation branch in XML                                                                                                                                                                      
    4420                 :  *                                                                                                                                                                                                                             
    4421                 :  * @package   core                                                                                                                                                                                                             
    4422                 :  * @category  navigation                                                                                                                                                                                                       
    4423                 :  * @copyright 2009 Sam Hemelryk                                                                                                                                                                                                
    4424                 :  * @license   http://www.gnu.org/copyleft/gpl.html GNU GPL v3 or later                                                                                                                                                         
    4425                 :  */                                                                                                                                                                                                                            
    4426                 : class navigation_json {                                                                                                                                                                                                        
    4427                 :     /** @var array An array of different node types */                                                                                                                                                                         
    4428                 :     protected $nodetype = array('node','branch');                                                                                                                                                                              
    4429                 :     /** @var array An array of node keys and types */                                                                                                                                                                          
    4430                 :     protected $expandable = array();                                                                                                                                                                                           
    4431                 :     /**                                                                                                                                                                                                                        
    4432                 :      * Turns a branch and all of its children into XML                                                                                                                                                                         
    4433                 :      *                                                                                                                                                                                                                         
    4434                 :      * @param navigation_node $branch                                                                                                                                                                                          
    4435                 :      * @return string XML string                                                                                                                                                                                               
    4436                 :      */                                                                                                                                                                                                                        
    4437                 :     public function convert($branch) {                                                                                                                                                                                         
    4438               0 :         $xml = $this->convert_child($branch);                                                                                                                                                                                  
    4439               0 :         return $xml;                                                                                                                                                                                                           
    4440                 :     }                                                                                                                                                                                                                          
    4441                 :     /**                                                                                                                                                                                                                        
    4442                 :      * Set the expandable items in the array so that we have enough information                                                                                                                                                
    4443                 :      * to attach AJAX events                                                                                                                                                                                                   
    4444                 :      * @param array $expandable
