    4445                 :      */                                                                                                                                                                                                                        
    4446                 :     public function set_expandable($expandable) {                                                                                                                                                                              
    4447               0 :         foreach ($expandable as $node) {                                                                                                                                                                                       
    4448               0 :             $this->expandable[$node['key'].':'.$node['type']] = $node;                                                                                                                                                         
    4449               0 :         }                                                                                                                                                                                                                      
    4450               0 :     }                                                                                                                                                                                                                          
    4451                 :     /**                                                                                                                                                                                                                        
    4452                 :      * Recusively converts a child node and its children to XML for output                                                                                                                                                     
    4453                 :      *                                                                                                                                                                                                                         
    4454                 :      * @param navigation_node $child The child to convert                                                                                                                                                                      
    4455                 :      * @param int $depth Pointlessly used to track the depth of the XML structure                                                                                                                                              
    4456                 :      * @return string JSON                                                                                                                                                                                                     
    4457                 :      */                                                                                                                                                                                                                        
    4458                 :     protected function convert_child($child, $depth=1) {                                                                                                                                                                       
    4459               0 :         if (!$child->display) {                                                                                                                                                                                                
    4460               0 :             return '';                                                                                                                                                                                                         
    4461                 :         }                                                                                                                                                                                                                      
    4462               0 :         $attributes = array();                                                                                                                                                                                                 
    4463               0 :         $attributes['id'] = $child->id;                                                                                                                                                                                        
    4464               0 :         $attributes['name'] = $child->text;                                                                                                                                                                                    
    4465               0 :         $attributes['type'] = $child->type;                                                                                                                                                                                    
    4466               0 :         $attributes['key'] = $child->key;                                                                                                                                                                                      
    4467               0 :         $attributes['class'] = $child->get_css_type();                                                                                                                                                                         
    4468                 :                                                                                                                                                                                                                                
    4469               0 :         if ($child->icon instanceof pix_icon) {                                                                                                                                                                                
    4470               0 :             $attributes['icon'] = array(                                                                                                                                                                                       
    4471               0 :                 'component' => $child->icon->component,                                                                                                                                                                        
    4472               0 :                 'pix' => $child->icon->pix,                                                                                                                                                                                    
    4473                 :             );                                                                                                                                                                                                                 
    4474               0 :             foreach ($child->icon->attributes as $key=>$value) {                                                                                                                                                               
    4475               0 :                 if ($key == 'class') {                                                                                                                                                                                         
    4476               0 :                     $attributes['icon']['classes'] = explode(' ', $value);                                                                                                                                                     
    4477               0 :                 } else if (!array_key_exists($key, $attributes['icon'])) {                                                                                                                                                     
    4478               0 :                     $attributes['icon'][$key] = $value;                                                                                                                                                                        
    4479               0 :                 }                                                                                                                                                                                                              
    4480                 :                                                                                                                                                                                                                                
    4481               0 :             }                                                                                                                                                                                                                  
    4482               0 :         } else if (!empty($child->icon)) {                                                                                                                                                                                     
    4483               0 :             $attributes['icon'] = (string)$child->icon;                                                                                                                                                                        
    4484               0 :         }                                                                                                                                                                                                                      
    4485                 :                                                                                                                                                                                                                                
    4486               0 :         if ($child->forcetitle || $child->title !== $child->text) {                                                                                                                                                            
    4487               0 :             $attributes['title'] = htmlentities($child->title);                                                                                                                                                                
    4488               0 :         }                                                                                                                                                                                                                      
    4489               0 :         if (array_key_exists($child->key.':'.$child->type, $this->expandable)) {                                                                                                                                               
    4490               0 :             $attributes['expandable'] = $child->key;                                                                                                                                                                           
    4491               0 :             $child->add_class($this->expandable[$child->key.':'.$child->type]['id']);                                                                                                                                          
    4492               0 :         }                                                                                                                                                                                                                      
    4493                 :                                                                                                                                                                                                                                
    4494               0 :         if (count($child->classes)>0) {                                                                                                                                                                                        
    4495               0 :             $attributes['class'] .= ' '.join(' ',$child->classes);                                                                                                                                                             
    4496               0 :         }                                                                                                                                                                                                                      
    4497               0 :         if (is_string($child->action)) {                                                                                                                                                                                       
    4498               0 :             $attributes['link'] = $child->action;                                                                                                                                                                              
    4499               0 :         } else if ($child->action instanceof moodle_url) {                                                                                                                                                                     
    4500               0 :             $attributes['link'] = $child->action->out();                                                                                                                                                                       
    4501               0 :         } else if ($child->action instanceof action_link) {                                                                                                                                                                    
    4502               0 :             $attributes['link'] = $child->action->url->out();                                                                                                                                                                  
    4503               0 :         }                                                                                                                                                                                                                      
    4504               0 :         $attributes['hidden'] = ($child->hidden);                                                                                                                                                                              
    4505               0 :         $attributes['haschildren'] = ($child->children->count()>0 || $child->type == navigation_node::TYPE_CATEGORY);                                                                                                          
    4506                 :                                                                                                                                                                                                                                
    4507               0 :         if ($child->children->count() > 0) {                                                                                                                                                                                   
    4508               0 :             $attributes['children'] = array();                                                                                                                                                                                 
    4509               0 :             foreach ($child->children as $subchild) {                                                                                                                                                                          
    4510               0 :                 $attributes['children'][] = $this->convert_child($subchild, $depth+1);                                                                                                                                         
    4511               0 :             }                                                                                                                                                                                                                  
    4512               0 :         }                                                                                                                                                                                                                      
    4513                 :                                                                                                                                                                                                                                
    4514               0 :         if ($depth > 1) {                                                                                                                                                                                                      
    4515               0 :             return $attributes;                                                                                                                                                                                                
    4516                 :         } else {                                                                                                                                                                                                               
    4517               0 :             return json_encode($attributes);                                                                                                                                                                                   
    4518                 :         }                                                                                                                                                                                                                      
    4519                 :     }                                                                                                                                                                                                                          
    4520                 : }                                                                                                                                                                                                                              
    4521                 :                                                                                                                                                                                                                                
    4522                 : /**                                                                                                                                                                                                                            
    4523                 :  * The cache class used by global navigation and settings navigation.                                                                                                                                                          
    4524                 :  *                                                                                                                                                                                                                             
    4525                 :  * It is basically an easy access point to session with a bit of smarts to make                                                                                                                                                
    4526                 :  * sure that the information that is cached is valid still.                                                                                                                                                                    
    4527                 :  *                                                                                                                                                                                                                             
    4528                 :  * Example use:                                                                                                                                                                                                                
    4529                 :  * <code php>                                                                                                                                                                                                                  
    4530                 :  * if (!$cache->viewdiscussion()) {                                                                                                                                                                                            
    4531                 :  *     // Code to do stuff and produce cachable content                                                                                                                                                                        
    4532                 :  *     $cache->viewdiscussion = has_capability('mod/forum:viewdiscussion', $coursecontext);                                                                                                                                    
    4533                 :  * }                                                                                                                                                                                                                           
    4534                 :  * $content = $cache->viewdiscussion;                                                                                                                                                                                          
    4535                 :  * </code>                                                                                                                                                                                                                     
    4536                 :  *                                                                                                                                                                                                                             
    4537                 :  * @package   core                                                                                                                                                                                                             
    4538                 :  * @category  navigation                                                                                                                                                                                                       
    4539                 :  * @copyright 2009 Sam Hemelryk                                                                                                                                                                                                
    4540                 :  * @license   http://www.gnu.org/copyleft/gpl.html GNU GPL v3 or later                                                                                                                                                         
    4541                 :  */                                                                                                                                                                                                                            
    4542                 : class navigation_cache {                                                                                                                                                                                                       
    4543                 :     /** @var int represents the time created */                                                                                                                                                                                
    4544                 :     protected $creation;                                                                                                                                                                                                       
    4545                 :     /** @var array An array of session keys */                                                                                                                                                                                 
    4546                 :     protected $session;                                                                                                                                                                                                        
    4547                 :     /**                                                                                                                                                                                                                        
    4548                 :      * The string to use to segregate this particular cache. It can either be                                                                                                                                                  
    4549                 :      * unique to start a fresh cache or if you want to share a cache then make                                                                                                                                                 
    4550                 :      * it the string used in the original cache.                                                                                                                                                                               
    4551                 :      * @var string                                                                                                                                                                                                             
    4552                 :      */                                                                                                                                                                                                                        
    4553                 :     protected $area;                                                                                                                                                                                                           
    4554                 :     /** @var int a time that the information will time out */                                                                                                                                                                  
    4555                 :     protected $timeout;                                                                                                                                                                                                        
    4556                 :     /** @var stdClass The current context */                                                                                                                                                                                   
    4557                 :     protected $currentcontext;                                                                                                                                                                                                 
    4558                 :     /** @var int cache time information */                                                                                                                                                                                     
    4559                 :     const CACHETIME = 0;                                                                                                                                                                                                       
    4560                 :     /** @var int cache user id */                                                                                                                                                                                              
    4561                 :     const CACHEUSERID = 1;                                                                                                                                                                                                     
    4562                 :     /** @var int cache value */                                                                                                                                                                                                
    4563                 :     const CACHEVALUE = 2;                                                                                                                                                                                                      
    4564                 :     /** @var null|array An array of navigation cache areas to expire on shutdown */                                                                                                                                            
    4565                 :     public static $volatilecaches;                                                                                                                                                                                             
    4566                 :                                                                                                                                                                                                                                
    4567                 :     /**                                                                                                                                                                                                                        
    4568                 :      * Contructor for the cache. Requires two arguments                                                                                                                                                                        
    4569                 :      *                                                                                                                                                                                                                         
    4570                 :      * @param string $area The string to use to segregate this particular cache                                                                                                                                                
    4571                 :      *                it can either be unique to start a fresh cache or if you want                                                                                                                                            
    4572                 :      *                to share a cache then make it the string used in the original                                                                                                                                            
    4573                 :      *                cache                                                                                                                                                                                                    
    4574                 :      * @param int $timeout The number of seconds to time the information out after                                                                                                                                             
    4575                 :      */                                                                                                                                                                                                                        
    4576                 :     public function __construct($area, $timeout=1800) {                                                                                                                                                                        
    4577               0 :         $this->creation = time();                                                                                                                                                                                              
    4578               0 :         $this->area = $area;                                                                                                                                                                                                   
    4579               0 :         $this->timeout = time() - $timeout;                                                                                                                                                                                    
    4580               0 :         if (rand(0,100) === 0) {                                                                                                                                                                                               
    4581               0 :             $this->garbage_collection();                                                                                                                                                                                       
    4582               0 :         }                                                                                                                                                                                                                      
    4583               0 :     }                                                                                                                                                                                                                          
    4584                 :                                                                                                                                                                                                                                
    4585                 :     /**                                                                                                                                                                                                                        
    4586                 :      * Used to set up the cache within the SESSION.                                                                                                                                                                            
    4587                 :      *                                                                                                                                                                                                                         
    4588                 :      * This is called for each access and ensure that we don't put anything into the session before                                                                                                                            
    4589                 :      * it is required.                                                                                                                                                                                                         
    4590                 :      */                                                                                                                                                                                                                        
    4591                 :     protected function ensure_session_cache_initialised() {                                                                                                                                                                    
    4592               0 :         global $SESSION;                                                                                                                                                                                                       
    4593               0 :         if (empty($this->session)) {                                                                                                                                                                                           
    4594               0 :             if (!isset($SESSION->navcache)) {                                                                                                                                                                                  
    4595               0 :                 $SESSION->navcache = new stdClass;                                                                                                                                                                             
    4596               0 :             }                                                                                                                                                                                                                  
    4597               0 :             if (!isset($SESSION->navcache->{$this->area})) {                                                                                                                                                                   
    4598               0 :                 $SESSION->navcache->{$this->area} = array();                                                                                                                                                                   
    4599               0 :             }                                                                                                                                                                                                                  
    4600               0 :             $this->session = &$SESSION->navcache->{$this->area}; // pointer to array, =& is correct here                                                                                                                       
    4601               0 :         }                                                                                                                                                                                                                      
    4602               0 :     }                                                                                                                                                                                                                          
    4603                 :                                                                                                                                                                                                                                
    4604                 :     /**                                                                                                                                                                                                                        
    4605                 :      * Magic Method to retrieve something by simply calling using = cache->key                                                                                                                                                 
    4606                 :      *                                                                                                                                                                                                                         
    4607                 :      * @param mixed $key The identifier for the information you want out again                                                                                                                                                 
    4608                 :      * @return void|mixed Either void or what ever was put in                                                                                                                                                                  
    4609                 :      */                                                                                                                                                                                                                        
    4610                 :     public function __get($key) {                                                                                                                                                                                              
    4611               0 :         if (!$this->cached($key)) {                                                                                                                                                                                            
    4612               0 :             return;                                                                                                                                                                                                            
    4613                 :         }                                                                                                                                                                                                                      
    4614               0 :         $information = $this->session[$key][self::CACHEVALUE];                                                                                                                                                                 
    4615               0 :         return unserialize($information);                                                                                                                                                                                      
    4616                 :     }                                                                                                                                                                                                                          
    4617                 :                                                                                                                                                                                                                                
    4618                 :     /**                                                                                                                                                                                                                        
    4619                 :      * Magic method that simply uses {@link set();} to store something in the cache                                                                                                                                            
    4620                 :      *                                                                                                                                                                                                                         
    4621                 :      * @param string|int $key                                                                                                                                                                                                  
    4622                 :      * @param mixed $information                                                                                                                                                                                               
    4623                 :      */                                                                                                                                                                                                                        
    4624                 :     public function __set($key, $information) {                                                                                                                                                                                
    4625               0 :         $this->set($key, $information);                                                                                                                                                                                        
    4626               0 :     }                                                                                                                                                                                                                          
    4627                 :                                                                                                                                                                                                                                
    4628                 :     /**                                                                                                                                                                                                                        
    4629                 :      * Sets some information against the cache (session) for later retrieval                                                                                                                                                   
    4630                 :      *                                                                                                                                                                                                                         
    4631                 :      * @param string|int $key                                                                                                                                                                                                  
    4632                 :      * @param mixed $information                                                                                                                                                                                               
    4633                 :      */                                                                                                                                                                                                                        
    4634                 :     public function set($key, $information) {                                                                                                                                                                                  
    4635               0 :         global $USER;                                                                                                                                                                                                          
    4636               0 :         $this->ensure_session_cache_initialised();                                                                                                                                                                             
    4637               0 :         $information = serialize($information);                                                                                                                                                                                
    4638               0 :         $this->session[$key]= array(self::CACHETIME=>time(), self::CACHEUSERID=>$USER->id, self::CACHEVALUE=>$information);                                                                                                    
    4639               0 :     }                                                                                                                                                                                                                          
    4640                 :     /**                                                                                                                                                                                                                        
    4641                 :      * Check the existence of the identifier in the cache                                                                                                                                                                      
    4642                 :      *                                                                                                                                                                                                                         
    4643                 :      * @param string|int $key                                                                                                                                                                                                  
    4644                 :      * @return bool                                                                                                                                                                                                            
    4645                 :      */                                                                                                                                                                                                                        
    4646                 :     public function cached($key) {                                                                                                                                                                                             
    4647               0 :         global $USER;                                                                                                                                                                                                          
    4648               0 :         $this->ensure_session_cache_initialised();                                                                                                                                                                             
    4649               0 :         if (!array_key_exists($key, $this->session) || !is_array($this->session[$key]) || $this->session[$key][self::CACHEUSERID]!=$USER->id || $this->session[$key][self::CACHETIME] < $this->timeout) {                      
    4650               0 :             return false;                                                                                                                                                                                                      
    4651                 :         }                                                                                                                                                                                                                      
    4652               0 :         return true;                                                                                                                                                                                                           
    4653                 :     }                                                                                                                                                                                                                          
    4654                 :     /**                                                                                                                                                                                                                        
    4655                 :      * Compare something to it's equivilant in the cache                                                                                                                                                                       
    4656                 :      *                                                                                                                                                                                                                         
    4657                 :      * @param string $key                                                                                                                                                                                                      
    4658                 :      * @param mixed $value                                                                                                                                                                                                     
    4659                 :      * @param bool $serialise Whether to serialise the value before comparison                                                                                                                                                 
    4660                 :      *              this should only be set to false if the value is already                                                                                                                                                   
    4661                 :      *              serialised                                                                                                                                                                                                 
    4662                 :      * @return bool If the value is the same false if it is not set or doesn't match                                                                                                                                           
    4663                 :      */                                                                                                                                                                                                                        
    4664                 :     public function compare($key, $value, $serialise = true) {                                                                                                                                                                 
    4665               0 :         if ($this->cached($key)) {                                                                                                                                                                                             
    4666               0 :             if ($serialise) {                                                                                                                                                                                                  
    4667               0 :                 $value = serialize($value);                                                                                                                                                                                    
    4668               0 :             }                                                                                                                                                                                                                  
    4669               0 :             if ($this->session[$key][self::CACHEVALUE] === $value) {                                                                                                                                                           
    4670               0 :                 return true;                                                                                                                                                                                                   
    4671                 :             }                                                                                                                                                                                                                  
    4672               0 :         }                                                                                                                                                                                                                      
    4673               0 :         return false;                                                                                                                                                                                                          
    4674                 :     }                                                                                                                                                                                                                          
    4675                 :     /**                                                                                                                                                                                                                        
    4676                 :      * Wipes the entire cache, good to force regeneration                                                                                                                                                                      
    4677                 :      */                                                                                                                                                                                                                        
    4678                 :     public function clear() {                                                                                                                                                                                                  
    4679               0 :         global $SESSION;                                                                                                                                                                                                       
    4680               0 :         unset($SESSION->navcache);                                                                                                                                                                                             
    4681               0 :         $this->session = null;                                                                                                                                                                                                 
    4682               0 :     }                                                                                                                                                                                                                          
    4683                 :     /**                                                                                                                                                                                                                        
    4684                 :      * Checks all cache entries and removes any that have expired, good ole cleanup                                                                                                                                            
    4685                 :      */                                                                                                                                                                                                                        
    4686                 :     protected function garbage_collection() {                                                                                                                                                                                  
    4687               0 :         if (empty($this->session)) {                                                                                                                                                                                           
    4688               0 :             return true;                                                                                                                                                                                                       
    4689                 :         }                                                                                                                                                                                                                      
    4690               0 :         foreach ($this->session as $key=>$cachedinfo) {                                                                                                                                                                        
    4691               0 :             if (is_array($cachedinfo) && $cachedinfo[self::CACHETIME]<$this->timeout) {                                                                                                                                        
    4692               0 :                 unset($this->session[$key]);                                                                                                                                                                                   
    4693               0 :             }                                                                                                                                                                                                                  
    4694               0 :         }                                                                                                                                                                                                                      
    4695               0 :     }                                                                                                                                                                                                                          
    4696                 :                                                                                                                                                                                                                                
    4697                 :     /**                                                                                                                                                                                                                        
    4698                 :      * Marks the cache as being volatile (likely to change)                                                                                                                                                                    
    4699                 :      *                                                                                                                                                                                                                         
    4700                 :      * Any caches marked as volatile will be destroyed at the on shutdown by                                                                                                                                                   
    4701                 :      * {@link navigation_node::destroy_volatile_caches()} which is registered                                                                                                                                                  
    4702                 :      * as a shutdown function if any caches are marked as volatile.                                                                                                                                                            
    4703                 :      *                                                                                                                                                                                                                         
    4704                 :      * @param bool $setting True to destroy the cache false not too                                                                                                                                                            
    4705                 :      */                                                                                                                                                                                                                        
    4706                 :     public function volatile($setting = true) {                                                                                                                                                                                
    4707               0 :         if (self::$volatilecaches===null) {                                                                                                                                                                                    
    4708               0 :             self::$volatilecaches = array();                                                                                                                                                                                   
    4709               0 :             register_shutdown_function(array('navigation_cache','destroy_volatile_caches'));                                                                                                                                   
    4710               0 :         }                                                                                                                                                                                                                      
    4711                 :                                                                                                                                                                                                                                
    4712               0 :         if ($setting) {                                                                                                                                                                                                        
    4713               0 :             self::$volatilecaches[$this->area] = $this->area;                                                                                                                                                                  
    4714               0 :         } else if (array_key_exists($this->area, self::$volatilecaches)) {                                                                                                                                                     
    4715               0 :             unset(self::$volatilecaches[$this->area]);                                                                                                                                                                         
    4716               0 :         }                                                                                                                                                                                                                      
    4717               0 :     }                                                                                                                                                                                                                          
    4718                 :                                                                                                                                                                                                                                
    4719                 :     /**                                                                                                                                                                                                                        
    4720                 :      * Destroys all caches marked as volatile                                                                                                                                                                                  
    4721                 :      *                                                                                                                                                                                                                         
    4722                 :      * This function is static and works in conjunction with the static volatilecaches                                                                                                                                         
    4723                 :      * property of navigation cache.                                                                                                                                                                                           
    4724                 :      * Because this function is static it manually resets the cached areas back to an                                                                                                                                          
    4725                 :      * empty array.                                                                                                                                                                                                            
    4726                 :      */                                                                                                                                                                                                                        
    4727                 :     public static function destroy_volatile_caches() {                                                                                                                                                                         
    4728               0 :         global $SESSION;                                                                                                                                                                                                       
    4729               0 :         if (is_array(self::$volatilecaches) && count(self::$volatilecaches)>0) {                                                                                                                                               
    4730               0 :             foreach (self::$volatilecaches as $area) {                                                                                                                                                                         
    4731               0 :                 $SESSION->navcache->{$area} = array();                                                                                                                                                                         
    4732               0 :             }                                                                                                                                                                                                                  
    4733               0 :         } else {                                                                                                                                                                                                               
    4734               0 :             $SESSION->navcache = new stdClass;                                                                                                                                                                                 
    4735                 :         }                                                                                                                                                                                                                      
    4736               0 :     }                                                                                                                                                                                                                          
    4737                 : }
